description: Gateshead end their six-match losing run with victory over struggling Dagenham to keep their National League play-off hopes alive.
title: Gateshead 2-1 Dagenham & Redbridge
title_page: National League: Gateshead 2-1 Dagenham & Redbridge - BBC Sport
maintext:
Gateshead ended their six-match losing run with victory over struggling Dagenham to keep their National League play-off hopes alive.
After a quiet start to the game, debutant Tim Akinola opened the scoring after 19 minutes.
And Gateshead doubled their lead eight minutes before half-time through Ethan Robson.
Josh Rees pulled a goal back for relegation-threatened Dagenham just after the hour mark but Gateshead held on to claim all three points, with home keeper George Shelvey producing an important save late on.
